alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:37PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Susquehanna and east central Bradford Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 637 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wysox, or near Towanda, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rush, Wysox, Springville, Dimock, Herrick, Wyalusing, Le Raysville, Friendsville, Brushville and Rushville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
